pages.title: Pastel Network
pages.text: Your primitive ways of item transport like hopper arrays do not compare to the Pastel Network - this is what you named clusters of Azurite-based nodes.$(br)Placed in close proximity, nodes will connect wirelessly to one another and form an item transfer network.$(br)Nodes do not require line of sight.

pages.title: Transfer Routes
pages.text: The way nodes can interact with one another.
